quoteText:
We receive information about you from other sources to help us correct or supplement our records, improve the quality or personalization of our service to you, and prevent or detect fraud.
 We collect personal information from consumer reporting agencies in conjunction with products or services that involve financial risk to Walmart, such as transactions in which Walmart extends you financing.
title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties
tosdr.tldr: In regard that "other sources" include third parties
